TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualTransition extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 表示当控件从一个状态转换到另一个状态时发生的可视行为。

span.span: Represents the visual behavior that occurs when a control transitions from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它通过添加状态之间进行转换时，可以指定控件的可视行为对象。You can specify the visual behavior of a control when it transitions between states by adding objects. 当你创建，你指定一个或多个以下：When you create a , you specify one or more of the following: - 转换状态时机，使通过设置之间所耗费的时间属性。The time it takes for a transition between states to occur by setting the property. - 通过设置在转换的时间发生的其他更改的控件的外观属性。Additional changes in the control's appearance that occur at the time of the transition by setting the property. - 当通过设置应用和属性。When the is applied by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，它指定当用户移动鼠标离开此控件，该控件的边框更改为蓝色，然后变为黄色，然后为黑色以 1.5 秒为单位。The following example creates a that specifies that when the user moves the mouse away from the control, the control's border changes to blue, then to yellow, and then to black in 1.5 seconds. 有关完整示例，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#8)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ From { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.From : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要从其过渡的 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the to transition from.

value.span: 要从其过渡的 的名称。

span.span: The name of the to transition from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是可选的。The property is optional. A可能会受到限制，将应用于仅某些状态或它可以应用任何时候，只要状态之间的控制转换。A can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states. 限制时通过设置应用和属性。You restrict when a is applied by setting the and properties. 下表描述了从最严限制到最宽松限制的限制级别。The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive. |限制类型Type of restriction|起始值Value of From|目标值Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |从一个指定状态到另一个指定状态From a specified state to another specified state|名称 The name of a |名称 The name of a | |从任意状态到指定状态From any state to a specified state|未设置Not set|名称 The name of a | |从指定状态到任意状态From a specified state to any state|名称 The name of a |未设置Not set| |从任意状态到其他任意状态From any state to any other state|未设置Not set|未设置Not set| 你可以有多个中的对象该公式引用相同的状态，但它们会使用上表指定的顺序。You can have multiple objects in a that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies. 你可以更改此行为，通过创建新的类，该类继承和重写方法。You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from and overriding the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个对象。The following example creates two objects. 当控件转换从`Pressed`状态`MouseOver`状态，同时具有和设置，则使用。When the control transitions from the `Pressed` state to the `MouseOver` state, the that has both and set is used. 当控件从非 `Pressed` 的状态转换为 `MouseOver` 状态时，将使用另一种状态。When the control transitions from a state that is not `Pressed` to the `MouseOver` state, the other state is used. [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从一个状态转为另一个状态所需的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time that it takes to move from one state to another.

value.span: 从一个状态转为另一个状态所需的时间。

span.span: The time that it takes to move from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定转换的时间通过设置属性。You can specify how long a transition takes by setting the property. 当你将设置属性，指定所需的转换发生的时间。When you set the property, you are specifying the time that it takes for the transition to occur. ## Examples 下面的示例指定控件，将在半秒进入`MouseOver`状态。The following example specifies that the control takes one half second to go into the `MouseOver` state. 有关完整示例，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#MouseOverTransition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#mouseovertransition)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Animation::IEasingFunction ^ GeneratedEasingFunction { System::Windows::Media::Animation::IEasingFunction ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Animation::IEasingFunction ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在状态间转换的自定义数学公式。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.

value.span: 用于在状态间转换的自定义数学公式。

span.span: A custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置属性来指定，将发生转换的方式。You can set the property to specify the way a transition occurs. 例如，你可以指定要加速或减速转换的缓动函数。For example, you can specify an easing function to accelerate or decelerate the transition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓动函数](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/easing-functions.md)。For more information, see [Easing Functions](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/easing-functions.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建，从而导致可垂直移动，当用户通过按下鼠标按钮。The following example creates a that causes a to move vertically when the user presses the mouse button over the . 该示例设置属性对象，从而导致能够看上去像反弹时它到达其目的地。The example sets the property to a object to cause the to appear to bounce when it reaches its destination. 用于当用户释放左键具有另一个对象，从而导致反弹它返回到其原始位置之前。The that is used when the user releases the button has another object to cause the to bounce before it returns to its original position. [!code-xaml[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunction](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml#vsmeasingfunction)] 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序和事件。The following example shows the event handler for the and events. 该示例通过调用方法可以更改的画布。The example calls the method to change the of the canvas. [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunctionLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#vsmeasingfunctionlogic)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunctionLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#vsmeasingfunctionlogic)]

summary.span: 获取或设置进行过渡时发生的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that occurs when the transition occurs.
The that occurs when the transition occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当包含、运行任何时间应用。When a contains a , the runs any time the is applied. 例如，如果你希望的边框若要更改颜色，当用户移动鼠标离开它时，可以创建具有更改按钮的背景。For example, if you want the border of a to change colors when the user moves the mouse away from it, you can create a that has a that changes the button's background. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，它指定当用户移动鼠标离开此控件，该控件的边框更改为蓝色，然后变为黄色，然后为黑色以 1.5 秒为单位。The following example creates a that specifies that when the user moves the mouse away from the control, the control's border changes to blue, then to yellow, and then to black in 1.5 seconds. 有关完整示例，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). A可能会受到限制，将应用于仅某些状态或它可以应用任何时候，只要状态之间的控制转换。A can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states. 限制时通过设置应用和属性。You restrict when a is applied by setting the and properties. 下表描述了从最严限制到最宽松限制的限制级别。The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive. |限制类型Type of restriction|起始值Value of From|目标值Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |从一个指定状态到另一个指定状态From a specified state to another specified state|名称 The name of a |名称 The name of a | |从任意状态到指定状态From any state to a specified state|未设置Not set|名称 The name of a | |从指定状态到任意状态From a specified state to any state|名称 The name of a |未设置Not set| |从任意状态到其他任意状态From any state to any other state|未设置Not set|未设置Not set| 你可以有多个中的对象该公式引用相同的状态，但它们会使用上表指定的顺序。You can have multiple objects in a that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies. 你可以更改此行为，通过创建新的类，该类继承和重写方法。You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from and overriding the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个对象。The following example creates two objects. 当控件转换从`Pressed`状态`MouseOver`状态，同时具有和设置，则使用。When the control transitions from the `Pressed` state to the `MouseOver` state, the that has both and set is used. 当控件从非 `Pressed` 的状态转换为 `MouseOver` 状态时，将使用另一种状态。When the control transitions from a state that is not `Pressed` to the `MouseOver` state, the other state is used.
